summary: it is what it sounds like, A sword from the old anime series Inuyasha.
descriptionHtml:
Sword Effects:
40 points of damage on dragons
60 points of damage on undead
0 points of damage on the living
banished summoned daedra
deanimate human magic
turn undead
and resurrect dead NPCs

Location:
Ruins of Rkund

Known Issues:
Ressurecting dead NPCs can cause them to loose their weapon or gear.

Notes:
Even though you cant hurt the living with this sword, dont swing at them to many times or you will p*** them off.

Let me know what yall think
author: boldpaste4
